address:
Hotel Road
Mount Lavinia, Sri Lanka
description: A food truck serving quality kottus using locally sourced ingredients and Lankan inspired flavours.

name: Spice & Curry
description: Authentic Sri Lankan cuisine just the way we like it; spicy and filling!

name: Krua Thai by Dao
description: Krua Thai is a brand new street food joint at Galle Road. Although they claim they're a street food type place, they've got a nice seating area and whatnot. We loved it!

name: Kottu & Co
description: A stall at Food Station that does kottu and iced milo all day.

name: Anaaj
address: 4/4, Mandakini Glow, Greenlands Lane, Isipathana Mawatha, Colombo 05
description: Anaaj is a home-chef who specialises in authentic Pakistani Biriyani. They also have a bunch of other interesting items on their menu.

name: Chasis
description: Good place to have a western type dinner with  a little chat.

name: Cakes & Bakes Restaurant
description: The newly opened Cakes and Bakes Café has been creating some hype so we wanted to see if the new restaurant would also have the potential to succeed in the future.

name: Newprema
description: Best place to try uncommon kinds of Kottu.

name: Mr Burger
address: It's right next to the bike shop at Galle Road.
description: Mr Burger is a new burger joint down Bambalapitiya. Most of their burgers are so-so, but we love their Quarter Pounder.

name: Rasembula
description: Rasembula gives the vibes of a rural cottage, but their food didn't live up to the expectations.

name: Tagine
description: Tagine is a new restaurant that shares the same building as Pho Vietnam. They  claim to serve Authentic Moroccan Cuisine, but it's really just a mix of dishes from various Middle Eastern/North African regions.

name: The Cauldron
description: A coffee shop with an affordable and tasty take on Sri Lankan classics, and a nice location.

name: The VoV Coffee Lounge
description: The VoV Coffee Lounge is a little eatery at Wellawatte that serves up 100% vegan food. They're fairly priced, the food is tasty and their burgers are sure to satisfy.

name: Thejan Hotel
description: A great place to eat rice & curry and tasteful Sri Lanka Chinese.

name: Dinemore (Kandy)
description: Dinemore is one of the most popular local franchises in Sri Lanka.

name: Jadi Samaga Game Kema
description: A great place to eat delicious, authentic Sri Lankan rice & curry.

name: CASA Italia Sri Lanka
address: 04, Samagi Mawatha, Rajamaha Vihara Road, Sri Jayawardenepura Kotte
description: CASA Italia Sri Lanka is a small Italian restaurant that serves up some good wood-fired, thin crust pizza, and has the cosiest, homey ambience.

name: Cafè Alfresco
description: A café specialising in teas and quick bites. As the name suggests, this is mostly for outdoor dining, so it's not the best choice on a rainy day.

name: King Chef Restaurant
description: A nice place to eat Asian food  while having a chat with friends or ...

name: Frosty Roll

name: World Spice
address: Level 4, Kandy City Center, Sri Wickrama Rajasinghe Mawatha, Kandy 20000
description: Rather mediocre food court in the Kandy City Center that serves Thai, Chinese, Italian and Indian cuisine.

name: Frozsta Kandy
description: Frozen yoghurt place and coffee shop rolled into one

name: Fat Panda
description: A multi-cuisine casual restaurant off Marine Drive, with a whole range of fusion Asian fare.

name: Jasmine Song
address: 169, E L Senanayake Veediya, Kandy, Central Province 20000
description: A decent Chinese restaurant in Kandy

name: Blue Lagoon (Jetwing Lagoon)
description: Blue Lagoon restaurant serves nice and surprisingly affordable food in a magnificent venue.

name: Jolly's Ice Cream (Dehiwala)
address: 147, Galle Road, Arpico Super Center, Dehiwala
description: Jolly's Ice Cream has opened their latest outlet in the suburbs of Dehiwala.

name: Double Cheese Coffee & Dine
description: Double Cheese Coffee & Dine is one of the finest family restaurants in Dehiwala area that dishes out a range of Sri Lankan and European food for an affordable price.

name: Java Lounge (Fort)
description: The Java Lounge has spawned yet another coffeeshop at Colombo 01. They still serve the same items from their menu and nothing much has changed except for the great new location.

name: CityRest Fort 24/7 Ice Cream
description: The only spot in Colombo serving ice cream 24/7/365!

name: Sea Fruit Bar and Coffee Lounge
description: Identity crisis. Is this seafood? A coffee lounge? A fruit bar?

name: Peri Peri Kukula
description: As the name suggests, Peri Peri Kukula specialises in spicy flame-grilled chicken along with some tasty sides.

name: Divine (Colpetty)
description: A Sri Lankan bakery chain.

name: Flamingo Restaurant (Ceylon City Hotel)
description: Flamingo Restaurant (which has been around forever) serves up an interesting mix of cuisines ranging from Arabic, Western,  Italian and Sri Lankan.

name: Sudarshan Veg
description: A 100%  veg restaurant serving North and South Indian food.

name: Fit Meals (Home Delivery)
description: A new start-up delivering healthy meals to your doorstep.

name: Saffron Kitchens (Hospital Street)
description: A cute cafe-style buth kade that serves up some amazing rice and curry at a great price.

name: Chinese Dragon Cafe (Wattala)
description: One of the better and more accessible restaurants in Wattala.

name: Ahinsa Restaurant and Guest House
description: A reasonably priced touristy restaurant in Sigiriya. It gives off Ella vibes.

name: Graze Kitchen (Hilton Colombo)
description: The Hilton's brand new multi-cuisine restaurant and buffet.

name: Copper Chimney (Prof. Stanley Wijesundara Mawatha)
description: A little hole-in-the-wall that serves the cheapest, most minimal, rice dishes.

name: OneUp All Day Breakfast
description: A cozy cafe serving breakfast all day.

name: Cafe Fort
description: A surprisingly  decent little cafe that's been around for a while located right next to the Dutch Hospital in Fort. They serve up some good rice and curry so it's a nice place to drop by when you're around the area during lunch time.

name: Chiminiya
description: A buth kadey down Perahara Road, Colombo 03. Quite popular, quite good.

name: Samanala Restaurant
address: Pitakotte - Talawatugoda Rd, Sri Jayawardenepura, Kotte
description: Affordable (hence usually crowded) place to have a drink in Pitakotte.

name: The Keg (Excel World)
description: A pub and restaurant located inside the Excel World.

name: Lavinia Bakers
description: The newest addition to the Lavinia Restaurant now serves Chinese, Indian and Sri Lankan food.

name: Thai Express
description: තායි එක්ස්ප්‍රස් එකේ තායි කෑම සුපිරි වුණාට වෙස්ටර්න් ටයිප් කෑම නම් ටිකක් අවුල් හොඳද.

name: Sea Breeze Seafood Restaurant
description: Great simple Sri Lankan and fusion/international food on Hiriketiya beach.

name: Sahan Agro Strawberry Corner
description: The Sahan Agro organic shop at Economic Center has a dessert parlour down Jambugasmulla Mawatha, Nugegoda. They dishes out a range of strawberry based snacks, drinks  and other natural products like bee honey.
bed and breakfast with cabanas on a relatively isolated patch of beach
name: Bara Beach Home
Awanhala (Ambepussa)
description: A pitstop to refresh yourself with a fine cup of tea on your way to Kandy.

name: Podi Hoona - The Little Gecko Luxury Campsite
address: Yala National Park, Kirinda - Sithulpawwa road, Thissamaharamaya
description: An incredibly beautiful luxury campsite which is a treat for eco-lovers, birdwatchers, and people who enjoy genuine rusticity.

name: The Last Drop
description: A restaurant and pub that serves some excellent dishes.

name: The Bungalow - Galle Fort
address: No. 5, Church Cross Street, Galle Fort, Galle
description: With its colonial elegance, comfortable accommodation, well trained staff, and the excellent food, The Bungalow - Galle Fort is a place that unites every bit of happiness that you're looking for in Galle.

name: Monsoon
description: Excellent South-East Asian cuisine in a beautiful and buzzing location.

name: Brew 1867 by Dilmah
description: Your ideal place to grab a quick breakfast or lunch, which is both healthy and freshly made.

name: Chinese Delight
description: Chinese Delight is one of Colombo's many, many Chinese eateries. They've got great Chinese food for an affordable price tag, with the nicest service.

name: The Regent Cafe
description: A greatly underrated place serving some of the best lamprais we have had. Highly recommend you check it out!

name: The Woods
description: A beautiful cottage hotel that provides the genuine jungle experience nestled in the wilderness of Beragala.

name: Liberty Plaza Food Court
address: Basement, Liberty Plaza, R.A. De Mel Mawatha, Colombo 03
description: Located at the basement of Liberty Plaza, the  food court houses restaurants catering to different cuisines.

name: Tea Blog
address: 758A, Dr. Danister de Silva Mawatha, Colombo 09
description: The newest bubble tea joint in Colombo. They also do cakes, burgers, waffles and sandwiches.

name: Hasara Kitchen
description: Hasara Kitchen is a popular spot in Nugegoda, that dishes out some okay rice and curry for a decent price tag.

name: Havi Restaurant
description: Havi at Pannipitiya is a good spot to chill with some booze, and delicious black pepper pork.

name: Navro Beach Restaurant
description: Navro Beach is one of the most popular restaurants in Panadura area, if you want to have a relaxed evening with some drinks and delicious food.

name: Salwa Turkish Food
description: A tiny food joint down Albert Place, Dehiwala that serves up some good street food for very cheap prices.

name: Wheelys Café
description: After cycling around Colombo  with their solar powered cart for about a year, Wheelys has settled down in on Jawatte Road. In addition to their single origin fair-trade coffee, they now also serve lunch and dinner.

name: Wayne's Junction
description: A cafe that seems to have Australian inspired dishes, as well as local delicacies. Only on paper, as it turned out.

name: Beach House
description: Great pizza place in Hiri with rather slow service.

name: Tides (Marriot Weligama)
description: A luxurious bar/lounge/dinner set up that doesn’t cost as much as it feels. The Discovery Table concept offers a value for money experience.

name: Weligama Kitchen (Marriot Weligama)
description: The Weligama Kitchen is the main restaurant at the Marriot Weligama, it serves an expansive range of local and foreign cuisines that rival the price and quality of similar establishments.

name: La Veranda
description: La Veranda is one of the newest cafes in town. Their food is alright, but the place itself needs a lot of improvement.

name: Big Fish (Marriot Weligama)
description: Big Fish provides a sea food fine dining experience that can probably satisfy the biggest food pedant at a cost that, while not cheap , certainly delivers value for money.

name: Calorie Counter Ward Place
description: The new Calorie Counter in Ward Place has better parking facilities than its compatriot in Thimbirigasyaya, but that's pretty much the best thing I can say about the place.

name: Cafe Kai
description: As far as hotel lobbies go, Kafe Kai provides a great vibe for work meetings, for anything else it's a tad too impersonal for our taste

name: Breeze Beverages & Bakery
description: A small gem in the busy Kandy streets serving some great coffee and deliciously sweet treats.

name: Isle of Gelato
description: Isle of Gelato serves some serious killer gelato. You should try.
